content:
I don't have personal recommendations or preferences, but i can provide information to help you make your own decision. the choice of festival to attend would depend on your personal interests and preferences. 

if you are interested in traditional costumes and military history, schützenfest may be the best choice for you. if you prefer colorful and playful costumes, carnival may be a good option. erntefest is perfect if you are interested in agriculture and harvest traditions, while krampuslauf is a unique and somewhat spooky pre-christmas tradition that might be appealing to some people.

ultimately, each festival in lower saxony has its own unique beauty and cultural significance, so you can't really go wrong with any of them. it would be best to research each festival in more detail and choose the one that speaks to your interests and passions the most.
